name: Triangular
description:
The game is about surviving and earning more points.

You play as a triangular prism who try to survive the attack of other cubes and prisms.

The game is focusing on clever maneuver and decisive strike.  You can exploit enemies' moves and use them to your advantage.

Currently, there is only two enemy type. I plan to add more and possibly throw in some bosses in the future.

Let me know what you think ...

and enjoy :)

CONTROLS:

WASD to move, left/right arrow to rotate;

Press ESC while gaming to access the menu.

The three vertical edge is your weapon;

Avoid been touched on the vertical surfaces.
